item.description:
Learn about your type sequence - other type parts of you beyond your core type, how your parent's types affect you and many different triads in the Enneagram that have some important traits in common, for instance, 126, 459, 378, 279, 135, 891, 567, 234, etc.

 

7:30-9:30pm

Ending time option between 9:30-10pm

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert, having taught over 2000 workshops on the Enneagram. He is a therapist who uses it in his counseling practice with individuals, couples and families and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Advanced Enneagram - Your Sequence of Types, Triads, and Parent's Types
